text: The Verve Pipe is a American rock band formed in 1992. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Pop Smear (1993) * Villains (1996) * The Verve Pipe (1999) * Underneath (2001) * Overboard (2014) * Parachute (2017) * Threads (2021) ==References== Category:American rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 1992 Category:Post-grunge bands
title: The Verve Pipe
